text:
John Elliott BSc (Hons) CEng
6 Shannon Close, Ilkley, West , LS29 9PJ,
Email : john.elliott@wharfetec.co.uk, Mobile +44 (0)7748 147647
Overview
An experienced senior manager with over 20 years successful work on new product development and capital projects with leading international companies. Programme budgets of over $20M and leading work streams across Europe and USA. Delivering new technology and equipment on time, to budget and to the quality required. Products delivered have included embedded software and hardware based consumer electronics, medical devices, industrial process equipment, CCTV and building management systems. A Chartered Engineer with proven transferable skills for leading, motivating, and developing teams, strategic planning, product management and successful new pro John Elliott BSc (Hons) CEng
6 Shannon Close, Ilkley, West , LS29 9PJ,
Email : john.elliott@wharfetec.co.uk, Mobile +44 (0)7748 147647
Overview
An experienced senior manager with over 20 years successful work on new product development and capital projects with leading international companies. Programme budgets of over $20M and leading work streams across Europe and USA. Delivering new technology and equipment on time, to budget and to the quality required. Products delivered have included embedded software and hardware based consumer electronics, medical devices, industrial process equipment, CCTV and building management systems. A Chartered Engineer with proven transferable skills for leading, motivating, and developing teams, strategic planning, product management and successful new product and project delivery.
Work History
Portakabin Ltd Oct 2018 – Aug 2019
£300M Modular building company selling and hiring modular buildings within the UK and European markets.
Programme Lead reporting to Director of Design and Engineering 2018 -2019
Leading the company’s highest priority strategic programme including workstreams of Design, Manufacturing, Supply Chain and Commercial, incorporating teams from the UK and Europe.
Aligned Senior European commercial teams on a common product specification.
Led teams to achieve a confirmed design of major components and new product cost.
Negotiated specification and contract terms for robotic manufacturing capital equipment within budget.
Managed the introduction and use of SharePoint for control of programme documentation and governance reporting.
Spooner Industries Ltd 2011 – Oct 2018
£20M/yr. Designer and Manufacturer of large mechanical capital goods industrial process equipment for drying, baking, curing, cooling and environmental within worldwide Food, Metals, Paper, Converting and Environmental sectors.
Head of Projects reporting to Managing Director 2016 – 2018
Led a team of 4 Project Managers delivering 62 worldwide capital equipment projects.
Led a team of 11 site installation and commissioning engineers for capital equipment installation.
Successfully project managed the design, manufacture, delivery, installation and commissioning for:
€4M project for a 60m bespoke non-woven glass fibre drying machine to Germany.
£3M project for a 30m bread oven and prover for a major UK bakery company.
£2M project for a 40m coil coat oven for a Turkish Metal coil coating company.
Project Systems Manager reporting to Sales Director / Deputy Managing Director 2011- 2016
Successfully project managed the design, manufacture, delivery, installation and commissioning for:
Five projects for a £4M bread oven, prover and cooler, for a major UK bakery company.
Two projects for a £3M bread oven and prover for a major Saudi bakery company.
£2M project for a 40m Coil coat oven for a Turkish Metal coil coating company.
Developed a SharePoint based Project Management system with Dash board reporting.
Wharfe Technology Ltd. Nov 2007 - 2011
Consultant / Interim management services for project management of new product development.
Consultant to IXICO Ltd, a start-up imaging medical device company.
Interviewed customers.
Reviewed medical imaging service market.
Advised on company product technology strategy.
Mentored CTO in managing teams and software projects.
Project Management services to Industrial Process equipment manufacturer.
DePuy International Ltd (A Johnson & Johnson Group Company) 2003 – 2007
$4Bn Global Orthopaedic joints replacement, Design and Manufacturer.
International Technology Director reporting to VP Concept Development. 2006 – 07
eMAT Programme Director reporting to Director, Global CAS Technology. 2004 – 06
Consultant to DePuy International Ltd. 2003 – 04
Successfully completed the design and proof of concept of an electromagnetic bone tracking system for use within computer assisted orthopaedic surgery.
Led the internal and external subcontract programme teams which were split between UK, Germany, Israel and USA.
Saved $1M on project costs by refocusing product specification to market requirements.
Workstreams included embedded hardware and software, PC software packages, mechanical design

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
